channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Disney Is Doing the World a Favor by Not Letting You See That ‘Doctor Who’ Spinoff Yet
item.description: 'The War Between the Land and the Sea' has wrapped up its short run in the UK, squandering what little potential it had to put a grim end note on the darkest year of 'Doctor Who' in decades.

item.title: The next big opportunity for health and beauty brands
item.description: Today’s consumers want integrated wellness solutions blending science, beauty, confidence, and identity. For most of my career at L’Oréal, I sold confidence in a tube: lipstick. But lipstick isn’t just about applying color to your lips. It’s about identity. Ritual. Power.

item.title: Google Is Spending Over $4 Billion on a Data Center Company
item.description: The deal should help Google develop more data centers that no one wants.

item.title: 6 Best Dehumidifiers to Keep Your Home Mold-Free (2026)
item.description: If you care about good air, it’s time for a dehumidifier. These are the best ones we’ve tested for everything from basements to drying laundry.

item.title: Sony’s First EV Collab With Honda Comes With PS Remote Play in Tow
item.description: Sorry, a proper handheld console is too hard. How about a whole car with built-in Remote Play?

item.title: This $450 RTX laptop deal is too good to ignore — Acer Nitro V packs RTX 5050, 16GB RAM and 13th Gen Core i5 power
item.description: Deal alert: This RTX 5050 Acer Nitro V laptop just hit a record-low $450, a saving of 41%.

item.title: ChatGPT’s yearly recap sums up your conversations with the chatbot
item.description: ChatGPT is joining the flood of apps offering yearly recaps for users. It's rolling out a "Year in Review" feature that will show you a bunch of stats - like how many messages you sent to the chatbot in 2025 - as well as give you an AI-generated pixel art-style image that encompasses some of […]

item.title: OpenAI says AI browsers may always be vulnerable to prompt injection attacks
item.description: OpenAI says prompt injections will always be a risk for AI browsers with agentic capabilities, like Atlas. But the firm is beefing up its cybersecurity with an "LLM-based automated attacker."

item.title: Nintendo has huge discounts on Switch 2 games in its holiday sale
item.description: Nintendo is in a giving state of mind this season, offering some holiday deals on games in the eShop, including a few recent Switch 2 titles. For instance, the Switch 2 version of Ball x Pit, which was one of our staff's favorite games of 2025, is 20 percent off at $12. Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles is $40, down from the usual $50 on Switch 2, which is about as good a deal as you’ll get for a current-year game release.There are also a few older games that have gotten even steeper discounts. Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition for the Nintendo Switch 2 is a whopping 75 percent off,...

item.title: ‘Stranger Things’ Reveals the Predictably Epic Runtimes of Its Remaining Episodes
item.description: As expected, you'll be spending many hours in Hawkins before you see how the Netflix series ends.

item.title: Ozempic Is Quietly Reshaping Our Shopping Habits
item.description: New research finds that people taking GLP-1 tend to spend less money grocery shopping, especially on snacks.

item.title: When AI-powered toys go rogue
item.description: Who’s legally liable with your kid’s talking bear misbehaves? If you’re thinking of buying your kid a talking teddy bear, you’re likely envisioning it whispering supportive guidance and teaching about the ways of the world. You probably don’t imagine them engaging in sexual roleplay—or giving advice to toddlers about how to light matches.

item.title: HelloFresh Meal Kit’s Discount Code for December 2025 Unlocks a Free Zwilling Knife
item.description: The Zwilling Four-Star chef’s knife is the carbon steel blade WIRED recommends for most casual home chefs. It’s free with HelloFresh meal kits, using this promo code.

item.title: Gemini 3 Flash is smart — but when it doesn’t know, it makes stuff up anyway
item.description: Gemini 3 Flash frequently makes up answers rather than saying “I don’t know."

item.title: Report: Starship Debris Came Closer to Airplanes Than SpaceX Admits
item.description: A new report by the Wall Street Journal reveals a failed SpaceX Starship test flight endangered three airplanes.
